xwikidoc.title: Object Sheet
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} ## You can modify this page to customize the presentation of your object. ## At first you should keep the default presentation and just save the document.
#set($class = $doc.getObject('XWiki.MyClass').xWikiClass) #foreach($prop in $class.properties) ; $prop.prettyName : $doc.display($prop.getName()) #end {{/velocity}}
